body: Rangers of the plains use horses or other riding beasts to hunt their lands, forging a near-mystical relationship with their mounts. Horse lords are unparalleled mounted combatants, the envy of even the most dedicated cavalier. Though called “horse lords” as a generic term, these rangers are not restricted to horses for their animal companions—any creature the ranger can ride is included in these abilities. A horse lord has the following class features.
name: Horse Lord
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Horse Lord

sections.body: At 2nd level, a horse lord must choose the mounted combat style.
sections.name: Combat Style Feat
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Horse Lord/Combat Style Feat

sections.body: At 4th level, the horse lord forms a bond with an animal he can use as a mount, which becomes his animal companion. A Medium ranger can select a camel or a horse. A small ranger can select a pony or wolf, but can also select a boar or dog if he is at least 7th level. This ability functions like the druid animal companion ability except that the ranger's effective druid level is equal to his ranger level – 3. The ranger gains a +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks with his animal companion mount. This ability replaces hunter's bond.
sections.name: Mounted Bond
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Horse Lord/Mounted Bond

sections.body: At 12th level, the horse lord strengthens his bond with his mount. The ranger's effective druid level for his mount is now equal to his ranger level. This ability replaces camouflage.
sections.name: Strong Bond
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Horse Lord/Strong Bond

sections.body: At 17th level, the horse lord can grant his animal companion temporary hit points equal to his ranger level once per day. While these temporary hit points last, when his mount is within 30 feet of the him, he can choose to share the damage taken by his mount as if using shield other. This ability replaces hide in plain sight.
